nodes.label: Untargeted scraping of facial images from internet or CCTV

question.prompt: Does the practice involve untargeted scraping of facial images from the internet or CCTV footage?
question.help: Untargeted = broad, non-individualised harvesting without specific data subjects or cases; as opposed to case-specific or consented collection. Consider sources: public web, platforms, data brokers, or CCTV streams.

items.label: Recital context
items.text: Recital (43): practice adds to the feeling of mass surveillance and can lead to gross violations of fundamental rights, including privacy.
